### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE articles (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  author VARCHAR(100),
  publication_date DATE,
  topic VARCHAR(50)
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE articles SET author='John Doe' WHERE id=1;
